resources:
Drink Vegas
Bars Entertainment Lounges Clubs
Bars Entertainment Lounges Clubs
The Chandelier Bar $$$$ Cosmopolitan A different cocktail menu on each floor A 3 tier venue, each with it\'s own feel, all encapsulated in an enormous chandelier.
The Griffin $$ Fremont St Easto Happy hour daily (17:00 - 20:00). Back room DJ starts at 22:00 Lit only by real fire, creating a unique ambience. A separate rom for dancing attracts a diverse crowd.
Yardhouse $$$ The Linq Happy Hour Mon-Fri 15:00-18:00 includes food and drinks 160 taps of imported, craft and specialty beers and a 130 item food menu. Large 1st floor patio.
5 O\'clock Somewhere $$ Flamingo 17:00-18:00 daily 5c beers. Happy hour 02:00-10:00 & 17:00-19:00 daily Beach themed mid-strip bar, with faux palm trees, tropical décor and an on-strip patio for people watching.
Coyote Ugly $$$ New York New York Daily happy hour 18:00-21:00. Free line dancing lessons Tues & Weds 19:00-20:00 The bar from the movie, with lady bartenders showcasing bar-top dancing and artistic pouring techniques.
AmeriCAN $$ The Linq Free giant Jenga and Connect 4. BYO food Nearly 70 canned beers from every U.S. state and some imports. Outdoor patio on The Linq Boulevard.
The Piano Bar $$$ Harrah\'s Big Elvis 14:00-18:00, Karaoke 18:00-21:00, Duelling Pianos 21:30-02:00 A full slate of live, interactive shows with a riotous party atmosphere. Outside patio.
Nine Fine Irishmen $$$ New York New York Happy hour Mon-Fri 14:00-17:00, nightly live music from 21:00 A piece of the Emerald Isle in the heart of Vegas, with indoor or al fresco Irish dining.
Gilley\'s $$$ Treasure Island Happy hours, line dance lessons, mechanical bull, karaoke & live bands. Inspired by the frontier days in the wild west, this fun country bar and BBQ brings plenty of yeeha to the Strip.
Ellis Island $ Koval Lane $2 beers all day, great value food & karaoke from 21:00 daily Vegas\' #1 Karaoke venue, in Nevada\'s #1 Brewery, with the best value food in Vegas.
Carnaval Court $$$ Harrah\'s Happy hour 11:00-15:00 Sun-Thur. Flair bartender shows daily An open-air street party at the center of the Strip. Day and night, you can enjoy music from live bands and DJs.
Redneck Riviera $$ Bally\'s Grand Bazaar Live country music nightly John Rich\'s quirky country bar. Great music, great drinks, great people!
Koi $$$$ PH Happy hour 17:00-19:00 daily including Japanese food and drinks Chic cocktail lounge with polished, Asian inspired decor and subdued lighting.
Skyfall Lounge $$$$ Mandalay Bay Sunset hour food and drinks specials 17:00-19:00 daily 180-degree views of the city along with an evolving nightlife experience that gradually increases in tempo into the night.
Alibi $$$$ Aria Open 12:00-05:00 daily. Food available The perfect convergence of premium cocktails and highly styled opulence.
Rhumbar $$$ Mirage Happy hour 14:00-18:00 daily on drinks and drink/cigar pairings Indoor and outdoor lounge with a chillout vibe, specialising in rum, cigars and hookah.
Rush $$$ Golden Nugget Live entertainment nightly Creative cocktails, live bands, comfy seating and blackjack tables.
107 Sky Lounge $$$ Stratosphere Happy hour 16:00-19:00 & 22:30-01:00 daily Sleek, DJ fuelled lounge offering drinks, food and stunning views from the 107th floor.
Hakkasan $$$$$ MGM Grand Michelin-starred Chefs & superstar DJs A 360-degree experience with fine dining & unparalleled entertainment over 5 levels.
Hyde $$$$ Bellagio Happy hour Weds 17:00-22:00 (wine only) A seamless indoor-outdoor Nightclub, with an expansive terrace overlooking the stunning Bellagio Fountains.
Marquee $$$$$ Cosmopolitan Atttracts the world\'s best DJs, performers, and celebrities The ultimate sensory experience with state-of-the-art audiovisual effects & sensuous décor.
Drai\'s $$$$$ The Cromwell Package deals available Indoor-outdoor panoramic partying, 11 stories high. Luxe design with state-of-the-art lighting technology.
Omnia $$$$$ Caesar\'s Palace World\'s leading superstar DJs. VIP Bar Card options available Multi-level venue with a seductive ultra-lounge, a high-energy main room, mezzanine & a rooftop garden.
XS $$$$$ Wynn Live performances from global artists Indoor-outdoor venue with cutting-edge technology production, light shows & pyrotechnics.
Hello blank fragment
